item.title: CLI Cheatsheet
item.description: This guide is for users of Mac OS and Windows Powershell. Unless specified, commands apply to usage on both systems.

item.title: Git CLI Cheatsheet
item.description: Resource Github Education Cheat Sheet Common Terms Term Description Git Version control system that lets you manage and keep track of your source code history Github A cloud-based hosting service that lets you manage Git repositories Repository (Repo) Repository tracks all changes made to files in your project, building a history over time in the .
